price: 36. Dheh: Rabbigay wuxuu u fidiyaa risiqa qofkuu doono oo ku cidhiidhiyaa (qofkuu doono), dadka badankiisuse ma oga.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ رَبِّي يَبۡسُطُ ٱلرِّزۡقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقۡدِرُ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul inna rabbī yabsuṭu al-riz'qa liman yashāu wayaqdiru walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
